Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_COMPONENTS_INS_SP" ( P_COMPONENT_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_COMPONENT_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION IN VARCHAR2, P_COMPONENT_VERSION IN VARCHAR2, P_IS_SYSTEM IN NUMBER, P_IS_ACTIVE IN NUMBER, P_IS_REPORT_ENABLED IN NUMBER, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1 ) IS V_ID NUMBER; BEGIN SELECT CMN_COMPONENTS_S1.NEXTVAL INTO V_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_COMPONENTS ( ID, COMPONENT_CODE, COMPONENT_VERSION, IS_ACTIVE, IS_SYSTEM, IS_REPORT_ENABLED, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) SELECT V_ID, P_COMPONENT_CODE, P_COMPONENT_VERSION, P_IS_ACTIVE, P_IS_SYSTEM, P_IS_REPORT_ENABLED, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'COMPONENT ALREADY EXISTS' FROM CMN_COMPONENTS WHERE COMPONENT_CODE = P_COMPONENT_CODE); CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS_INS_SP ( 'CMN_COMPONENTS', V_ID, P_COMPONENT_NAME, P_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION, P_CREATED_BY, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL ); END;
